General Management Programme for Young Leaders

The young CEO’s guidebook, designed and delivered by IIMB’s IIMBx

Download Brochure

Download Programme Schedule

Programme Overview

The corporate landscape of this day and age has changed in several significant ways. Talented young professionals are being presented with the opportunity to take on senior roles and are given managerial responsibilities quite early in their career. In addition to this, many of them work for startups and SMEs that require them to have a more holistic understanding of businesses in addition to technical knowledge. With a steep learning curve to handle, young leaders frequently struggle to make informed decisions and, as a result, often doubt their own abilities. That's where we come in. IIMB, with its close association and interaction with industries over the last four decades, understands this challenge and has created a unique programme for the young leaders of today. The programme provides them with a strong foundation in management and gives them the confidence to vault the inevitable hurdles that arise in every successful career.

Programme Objective

The General Management Programme for Young Leaders (YLP) aims to achieve the following objectives.
  • Provide analytical and communication skills to young managers
  • Gain a strong working knowledge in managing different functions like production, marketing, finance and human relations
  • Provide confidence in managing accounting and financial matters
  • Learn to read the competitive landscape and build strategies

Pedagogy

  • The programme is delivered using the blended learning format. This means you will learn via classroom sessions, course videos, webinars, and interviews.
  • The programme includes a live connect with IIMB faculty through webinars and campus visits. You will be able to discuss industry trends, theories, and real-life scenarios both virtually and in person.
  • This programme is designed to help you understand how each management concept is applied in the workplace. Through interviews with industry experts, you will be able to gain a real-world perspective of everything you learn.
  • Each course is closely supported by subject matter experts from the IIMBx team. They answer queries, reply to and edit posts, and communicate course updates.

Courses

Module 1: Foundations for Management
  • Business and Economics
  • Organization Design for Creating Competitive Advantage
  • Business Communication
  • Business Statistics and Analytics
  • Accounting for Decision Making
Module 2: Functional Management
  • Operations Management
  • Marketing Management
  • Corporate Finance
  • People Management
  • Strategic Management

Course Curriculum

Module 1 offers five courses on Foundations for Management

Statistics for Business
Hide

Statistics for Business

  • This introduction to statistics course examines data from the perspective of business scenarios and demonstrates how to apply this data to make better decisions.
    • ##
  • Instructor: MS Narasimhan, Professor, IIM Bangalore
    • ##
  • Course Duration: 6 weeks
##

Hide

Accounting for Decision Making

  • Learn how to read and interpret financial statements and manage costs to take informed business decisions.
    • ##
  • Instructor: Ashis Mishra, Professor, IIM Bangalore
    • ##
  • Course Duration: 8 weeks

Managerial Economics

Organizational Design for Competitive Advantage

Frequently Asked Questions

##
##
##
##
##
##

How do I apply?

##

Please click here to apply

##

Is there an eligibility criterion?

##

Please click here for the eligibility criteria

##
##
##

Is there any duration for the programme?

##

The programme is designed for 10 months but you have to complete the programme within 2 years to earn the certificate.

##

Is there any scholarship?

##

Limited financial assistance will be provided upon request to deserving candidates.

##
##
##

Is there any age limit for applying for this programme?

##

This programme is recommended for individuals above 22 years and below 50 years of age.

##

What infrastructure/ facility is needed in order to take this programme?

##

You will require a computer and a good Internet connection.

##
##
##

Should I pay the fees in one go?

##

Fees can be paid in full during registration or in two equal instalments – (i) at time of registration and (ii) three months after course commencement.

##

What is the admission procedure?

##

Upon registration, you will receive a link to take up a self-assessment test. Based on the result of this you will qualify for a telephonic interview. Selection into the programme depends on the test score and the interview. The first list of selected candidates will be announced by mid of April 2018. The second list of registration are now open and result for the same will be announced by mid of May 2018.

##
##
##

How/where will the interview be conducted?

##

If there is a necessity, the interview will be online or telephonic.

##
##
##

How do I track my application?

##

Once you have submitted your application form, you can write to our student support mail id (ctm-admissions@iimbx.edu.in) to know the status of your submission.

##

Do I need to hold a CAT, JEE or a similar exam rank?

##

No. This is not required.

##
##
##

May I defer my admission?

##

Your admission will be deferred only if such a request is raised at least 10 days prior to the start of the programme. This also allows for a refund. Cancellations during the run of the programme will not be refunded.

##

How will the course be delivered - completely online or blended?

##

The course will predominantly be delivered online. The webinars and discussion forums will help you interact with your instructor more frequently and actively. Multiple campus connect sessions held during the modules will allow you to interact with your instructors and peers face-to-face.

##
##
##

Do I need to take the courses in sequence?

##

The courses will run as per a fixed schedule.

##

On successful completion of the course, will learners become a part of IITM/IIMB Alumni?

##

No.

##
##
##

Who will the certificate be provided by?

##

The certificate will be provided jointly by IIMBx and IITM CCE.

##

##

##
##
##
##
## ##
##

About IIMBx

IIMBx is founded on the belief that management education has the potential to transform our educational systems. It is built upon our philosophy to make high-quality education available to everybody regardless of the limitations imposed by location, finances, and prior educational background. Led by the faculty at IIM Bangalore, IIMBx makes the construction of this progressive future possible by offering students online courses and programmes that cover both core and advanced subjects in the fields of business and management.
